header.name: Adeel Ali
header.punch-line: I build things for the web and love what I do
header.bio: Mainly focused on Front-end Development with a good UI/UX eye and always trying different things.

default.bio-end: I speak many languages but also JavaScript.

dude.bio-end: Remember when we cared about IE6?

work.title: Places that I’ve worked
work.subtitle: Amazing and skilled people I've met

journey.title: My Journey
journey.intro: I started working with Embedded systems and programmed my first Robot in 2011. My professional career started in 2012 after completion of Bachelors in Computer Engineering degree. I always loved design + code but since I am not as close as a Designer (look at the design of this website) I became Software Engineer.
journey.body: I jump started my Mobile Apps and Games developer career in 2014 and till now I have developed more than 7+ cross platform educational games, 5+ cross platform mobile applications and helped in development of several other projects.
journey.conclusion: Now as Principal Software Engineer, I am responsible for cross team communication, mentoring, doing R&Ds, writing project requirement document (PRDs), libraries and frameworks.

gists.subtitle: Don’t have a blog yet but I have Gists!

footer.quote: Made with a lot of anxiety during the COVID-19's quarantine.
